# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdno-service-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/servicechain/servicechainservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/servicechainservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161102.084323-4.zip" && unzip -q -o -B sdno-service-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f sdno-service-servicechain-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8521
RUN echo Open-O sdno-service-servicechain 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdno/servicechain/servicechainservice-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/servicechainservice-deployment-1.1.0-20161102.084323-4.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
